House Bill/Resolution NO. HB04788
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROVIDING FOR THE ACQUISITION OF MATERIEL, SYSTEMS, FACILITIES, INTEGRATED MILITARY SYSTEMS AND SERVICES BY THE DEPARTMENT OF NATIONAL DEFENSE AND ITS BUREAUS AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Aims to remedy the incapability of the current procurement laws, rules and regulations in addressing the procurement needs of the defense establishment because of its very peculiar nature. Seeks to capacitate the defense establishment to properly pursue the modernization of our armed forces especially in the acquisition of defense materiel, systems, military facilities and installation services.
ALIAS NAME : "Defense Acquisition Act of 2019"
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : BIAZON, ROZZANO RUFINO B.
DATE FILED : 2019-09-23
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
